name: Game Over (itch)
description:
This game is over. You are seconds before losing. You should restart it right now, There's no use even unpausing it. Abandon all hope. Or, maybe, figure out, what to do when all is said and done.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys plus mouse, space to continue dialogues.

If you win, stay for the credits!

Submission for Austria Game Jam 2016 (Theme: Abandon All Hope).

Created by
Thomas Korosa (Programming, Concept)
Jonathan Montineri (Programming, Concept)
Fahmi Alsalmi (Design)
